message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.NE. 

The paper deals with a fundamental NLP problem of determining whether a given claim is supported by evidence, which falls under the category of computational linguistics (cs.CL). The proposed system, TwoWingOS, involves joint optimization of evidence identification and claim entailment, which involves machine learning techniques such as optimization and training a joint model, falling under the categories of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The system also involves information retrieval techniques for identifying evidence, which falls under the category of information retrieval (cs.IR). Finally, the paper involves neural network-based approaches for improving performance, which falls under the category of neural networks (cs.NE).
